name: House Blend
description: Smooth medium roast. Notes of chocolate and nuts. Perfect for every day.

name: Espresso Roast
description: Dark roast for rich espresso. Bold and full-bodied.

name: Single Origin Ethiopia
description: Light roast with floral and berry notes. Washed process.

name: Decaf House
description: Swiss water decaf. Same great taste, no caffeine.

name: Iced Latte
description: Double shot espresso over ice with steamed milk. Served cold.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso with foamed milk. Classic and creamy.

name: Cold Brew
description: Slow-steeped for 18 hours. Smooth and less acidic.

name: Mocha
description: Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk. Topped with whip.

name: Butter Croissant
description: Fresh-baked buttery croissant. Flaky and golden.

name: Chocolate Muffin
description: Rich chocolate muffin with a soft crumb. Perfect with coffee.

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Warm cinnamon roll with cream cheese frosting.

name: ZunCafe Tumbler
description: Insulated 16oz tumbler. Keeps hot for 4 hours, cold for 12.
